status.429: Too many requests or exceeded API quota

solution.401:
1. Click ⚙️ in the top-right corner of the plugin -> Select provider [Shenma] -> Click [Re-login] button
2. Contact administrator
solution.400:
1. End the current task and start a new one.
2. Try again using a different model.
3. Contact administrator
solution.403:
1. Check permission settings
2. Try again using a different model.
3. Contact administrator
solution.404:
1. Verify request path/resource existence
2. Contact administrator
solution.500:
1. Try again later
2. Try switching models
3. Contact administrator
solution.502:
1. Try again later
2. Try switching models
3. Contact administrator
solution.503:
1. Try again later
2. Try switching models
3. Contact administrator
solution.504:
1. Try again later
2. Try switching models
3. Contact administrator
solution.undefined:
1. Check your network connection
2. Check proxy and firewall settings
3. Contact administrator
